articles.title: Site arrival checklist
articles.summary: A 2-minute checklist to prevent rework and speed up closeout.
content: Confirm ticket details before entering the site.
Capture LED states and any visible errors.
Take label photos before making changes.

articles.title: Basic network triage
articles.summary: Interactive guided troubleshooting for connectivity issues.

link_fix.result: No physical link detected. Reseat cable, try known-good cable or port. If still no link, escalate with port ID.

ip.question: Does the device have a valid IP address?

dhcp_fix.result: Likely DHCP/VLAN issue. Verify port profile and VLAN. Escalate with MAC and port ID.

gateway.question: Can you ping the default gateway?

routing_fix.result: Gateway unreachable. Suspect VLAN mismatch or routing issue. Escalate with IP and VLAN.

dns.question: Can you resolve a known hostname?

dns_fix.result: DNS issue suspected. Test direct IP. Escalate with resolver info.

success.result: Connectivity looks good. If service still fails, escalate to application owner.
